name: Dice with Death
description:
Welcome to Dice with Death,  A roguelike deck builder that centres around boosting your odds in a simple dice roll off.

Battle through 6 unusual characters in the afterlife to earn your way back to the land of the living.

Each battle you start with 3 cards, gaining another each round. You can play as many or as little as you want before ending your turn by rolling. Highest roll wins. Keep an eye on the enemy as how confident they look reveals the strength of their roll.

f1: lower volume,  f2: increase volume

All music by Kevin Macleod at https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html
